name: unix-time-converter
title: Smart Unix Time Converter
description: Attempts a smart bi-directional translation between unix (epoch) time and human readable dates.
author: rpandey1234

commands.name: convert
commands.title: Auto-convert Unix <> Human Time
commands.description: Making it easier for humans and computers to understand each other. Given an input, this command tries to smartly detect a unix (epoch) time or human time and convert it to the other.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
